description: Endpoints (leaves) in rooted trees with n nodes.
references: R. W. Robinson and A. J. Schwenk, The distribution of trees in a large random tree, Discr. Math., 12 (1975), 359-.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Tree Leaf.

author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: Corrected and extended with formula by _Christian G. Bower_, May 25 2000
